page.title: 04Crown Pools Ipswich
page.content: Crown Pools is on the outskirts of the town centre.Crown pools is a swimming pool complex with a leisure pool, competition pool,teaching pool for toddlers and a snack bar. The leisure pool has a wave machine and two fountains,with seats,sunshades and tropical plants surrounding it. There is also going to be a water slide which will probably cost around thirty- thousand pounds. The competition pool is where all the clubs are held and the teaching pool is only for children who are learning to swim.The entrance fee is thirty pence,but is going up to forty pence.The changing facilities are quite good.There are two open changing rooms and a reasonable amount of cubicles. When you have changed you put your clothes into a locker which you secure with a key.
